description: Bruce Beckham takes his job as a security agent seriously, and he isn't going to let just anyone waltz through his checkpoint. When Jeremy Spreadums comes walking through, he knows immediately that the dark-haired hottie is hiding something. As happens all too often, it turns out that Jeremy is trying to get one over on Bruce, smuggling a string of anal beads in his ass. Bruce decides that if Jeremy likes ass play so much, then he should at least have the decency to let muscle daddy Bruce try him out. Bruce bends Jeremy over and gives the hunk a long, deep rimming before he pounds his hole right there at the security counter. Jeremy can't get enough, begging for more until the muscular stud blows his load deep in Jeremy's hole.
title: What's Up His Ass Part 3
